title: How do modern bands earn money? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bands these days rely possibly more than previously on show earnings which are a mix of ticket sales and merchandise. Some offer their music free to spread their marketing further and to develop a larger fan base. Royalties for playing music don't tend to add up for much in the consumer market but if they have a track licensed for an advert, film or even background music in TV then they can earn from that use as well as gain an increase in fan base.
